[scenario]
clients=client10026;client10027
actions=negotiate-retry-fail

[config]
privilege_mode=true
retry_connect_time=2.0
use_process_launcher=true

[client10026]
port=10026

[client10027]
port=10027
run=false
arguments=--exit

[negotiate-retry-fail]
command=negotiate

version=2
action=add-headers|change-body|quarantine
step=none

response=negotiate-reply
n_emitted=1

error_domain=milter-manager-child-error-quark
error_type=MilterManagerChildError
error_code=milter-exit
error_message=client10027 exits with status: 0
